reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the collection of data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly states that the app collects various types of information from users directly or automatically.
reply.reference: We collect several types of information from and about users of the Mobile App... URL: https://www.acemyhealth.us/branded-app-privacy-policy

Privacy Notice
I. Introduction
AceMyHealthCircle (collectively, the "Company," "we," "our," or "us") knows that you care about how your personal information is used and shared. We take your privacy seriously and want to outline the measures we employ in safeguarding your personal information.
This Privacy Notice covers Company's treatment of information collected when you access the mobile application or any other linked pages, features, content, or application services offered from time to time...

to believe that a child under the age of 18 has provided personal information to Company through this Mobile App, please contact us, and we will endeavor to delete that information from our databases.
IV. Information We Collect and How We Collect It
We collect several types of information from and about users of the Mobile App, including information:
- by which you may be personally identified, such as name, postal address, e-mail address, phone number, or any other identifier by which you may b...

process personal information from around the world, including from other countries in which Company has operations, in order to provide the Mobile App.
If you are accessing or using our Mobile App or otherwise providing personal information to us, you are agreeing and consenting to the processing of your personal information in the United States and other jurisdictions in which we operate.
XIII. Your California Privacy Rights.
California Civil Code Section 1798.83 permits users who are Californi...

our policies and practices regarding your information and how we will treat it. reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects personal information, content submissions, preferences and demographics, geolocation, internet connection details, equipment information, account and login details, chat and email data, occupation history, date of birth, credit card information, financial and economic details, gender.

reply.analysis: The answer is derived from the section 'Information We Collect and How We Collect It' which lists the various types of information the app collects from users.
reply.reference: personal information, content submissions, preferences and demographics, geolocation, internet connection details, equipment information, account and login details, chat modules, messaging and email data, including related metrics, occupation history, date of birth, credit card information and other payment processing information, financial and economic information, gender URL: https://www.acemyhealth.us/branded-app-privacy-policy

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use.

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt out of data collection or delete data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that users can notify the company to opt out of receiving certain marketing emails and each marketing email includes an opt-out button or unsubscribe link. This indicates that users have the option to opt out of data collection. Additionally, the policy also mentions that the company has the right to disclose personal information with user consent, which implies that users have control over their data.
reply.reference: You may notify us to opt-out from receiving certain marketing emails and each marketing email will include an opt-out button or unsubscribe link. URL: https://www.acemyhealth.us/branded-app-privacy-policy
